flawed_nl_solution:
Ajax weighs 80 x 2.2 = <<80*2.2=176>>176 in pounds.
He will lose 1.5 x 2 = <<1.5*2=3>>3 pounds per day.
So he will lose 3 x 7 = <<3*7=21>>21 pounds per week.
So, he will lose 21x 2 = <<21*2=42>>42 pounds after 2 weeks.
Therefore, he will weigh 176 - 42 = <<176-42=143>>143 pounds after 2 weeks.
#### 143

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 134, not 143. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
